description: The Adventura 170 by Lowepro is perfect for the DSLR user who's looking for a protective, lightweight, streamlined shoulder bag that's packed with practical features at a great value. The zippered main compartment features a quick-release buckle and rainflap lid, offering quick access to contents when bag is unzipped, and extra protection when it is fully closed. A removable/adjustable shoulder strap features a non-slip patch and sturdy snaphooks make connections secure. Insde the fully padded interior, a soft tricot lining provides protection, plus a high-visibility burnt orange color - making it easy to see gear while you work out of the bag. Additional organization features include: zippered front pocket with memory card storage, and two pleated side pockets. For additional carrying options there are two belt loops on the back, as well as a padded grab handle on top.
title: Lowepro Adventura 170 Camera Case (Black)
